actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to revise civil service retirement provisions as they apply to Federal mine inspectors.

summary.text: Sets age and length of service requirements for the pension eligibility of Federal mine inspectors and establishes the amount of such annuity.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to revise civil service retirement provisions as they apply to Federal mine inspectors.
